emails.subject: Meeting Reminder
emails.body: Hi team, Just a reminder that we have a meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 10 AM. Please make sure to prepare your updates.

emails.subject: Vacation Plans
emails.body: Hey everyone, I'll be on vacation next week. Please handle any urgent matters before I'm out. Thanks!

emails.subject: New Product Launch
emails.body: Hello all, We're excited to announce our upcoming product launch. Get ready for an amazing reveal!

emails.subject: Technical Support
emails.body: Hello, We've received your support request. Our team will get back to you shortly with a solution.

emails.subject: Monthly Newsletter
emails.body: Greetings, Check out our latest newsletter with exciting updates, articles, and promotions.
